overview: Ármin is 14 years old. Punk on the better days, nazi on the worse, but mostly a confused teenager and a talented guitarist. His father, József ‘Dönci’ Dénes, an iconic guitar virtuoso of the 70’s underground culture has been dead for 8 years. Ármin has been living with his mother and three siblings in a sheltered housing unit ever since, trying to bring order to the chaos what Dönci has left behind.
title: Filthy Times
